thread.section_title: InMyArea.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InMyArea.com | inmyarea.com | 2 of 41
thread.title: kelly

author: kelly
title: kelly
text:
I got Joseph and he was so AWESOME, GREAT and very HELPFUL. I wish every customer service rep I had to talk to is just like him. He explained everything to me in detail and didn't make me feel like I was I was stupid. I don't know a lot about internet or WiFi or anything like that, he was so easy to talk to. I could go on and on how great he is, so I hope he gets all the acknowedgement, rewards, and raises that he so well Deserves and no, I'm not related to him - I hope his boss, supervisor, manager or whatever knows they have a great asset on their team and he needs to be recognized.
Thank you
